title: freehand script?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110311im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6130.gif)

Anybody know what the freehand or script face used here is?

Thanks,

T

 [‹ Digital alternative to hand-painted type on boat](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110311/http:/typophile.com/node/50069 "Go to previous forum topic") [Simple sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110311/http:/typophile.com/node/50235 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Thomas Phinney

comments.content: I think it is based on [Pepita](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009110311/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/pepita_std_regular/?sample_text=AZ&sample_size=96).

I believe that’s it, alright. Thanks!

T
